title: Leftwards Hand Medium Dark Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Point Left Medium Dark Skin Tone
description: A hand pointing to the left, with a medium-dark skin tone. Used to indicate direction, to draw attention to something on the left, or to express a negative or dismissive sentiment.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the leftwards hand emoji with a medium-dark skin tone is depicted with a clear, defined gesture, rendered with Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and realistic lighting to give it a tactile feel. The soft rounded edges of the fingers and palm ensure a friendly and approachable appearance, signifying direction, pointing, or indicating a movement to the left. This emoji is a straightforward way to guide attention or indicate a specific location or action.
